headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) fell 2.5% in the afternoon session after the stock's negative momentum continued as KeyBanc Capital Markets downgraded the stock to 'Sector Weight' from 'Overweight', citing valuation concerns after a significant run-up.

headline: How the Narrative Around Lam Research Is Shifting With Emerging AI and Semiconductor Trends
summary: Lam Research's consensus analyst price target has shifted only slightly, moving up from $109.10 to $110.53. This marginal change comes as analysts weigh the company's strengthening position in high-growth semiconductor segments against competitive headwinds and questions about valuation. Stay tuned to learn how you can keep informed about shifts in Lam Research's outlook as the narrative continues to evolve. headline: Lam Research Corporation (LRCX) Collaborates With JSR Corporation
summary: ​Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the Best Technology Stocks to Invest in for the Long Term. On September 15, Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) announced its collaboration with JSR Corporation to advance semiconductor manufacturing. ​The collaboration is designed to speed up the industry’s move to next-generation patterning technologies, including dry resist technology for extreme […]
